amendment.description: Amendment includes members of qualified Indian tribes as eligible to receive loans under the Community Express Program in section 103 of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 110-108 to include `members of qualified Indian tribes' as eligible to participate in the Community Express Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Matheson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Matheson.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Matheson amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
